FIPS - Get state names from any type of FIPS codes

Source: R/FIPS_FUNCTIONS.R
fips2statename.Rd

FIPS - Get state names from any type of FIPS codes

Usage

fips2statename(fips)

Arguments

fips

vector of FIPS

Value

vector of state names

Examples

  cbind(fips_lead_zero(1:80), fips2state_abbrev(1:80), fips2statename(1:80))
#> Warning: NA returned for 23 values that failed to match
#> Warning: 23 fips could not be converted to state name - returning NA for those
